title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-26] [$250] Workspace - "Delay submissions" turns off if the "Submission frequency" is set to "Manually"
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Log in with a new expensifail account
2. Create a workspace
3. Turn "Workflows" on
4. Navigate to Workflows
5. Turn "Delay submissions" on
6. Set "Submission frequency" to "Manually"

Expected result: "Delay submissions" should remain on

Actual result: None
